name: Savanna Survival
description: SavannaSurvival is a one-of-a-kind game combining the best of auto-battler, edutainment and management genres. Family-friendly and suitable for players of all backgrounds and ages, youâ€™ll have lots of fun exploring the Savanna and beyond while learning all about wildlife along the way! The game is both free-to-play & play-and-earn. Players can unlock special benefits and enhance their gaming experience with NFTs, but anyone can enjoy an all-rounded experience of the game for free!
